summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of the UI component responsible for displaying ancillary trust files, checking widget creation, signal emission on file additions, column visibility toggling, representation of add/delete actions, and support for custom markup and trust rendering.
business_intent: Ensure the ancillary trust file list UI reliably reflects policy changes and integrates correctly with changeset data, providing accurate visual feedback and extensibility for custom rendering in the policy analysis application.
